news.headline: The AI Trade Is Back. This ETF Shows Why.
news.summary: The AI trade is back, if the GlobalX Artificial Intelligence & Technology exchange-trade fund is any indication.  The ETF has 85 component stocks, ranging from  Tencent Holdings  which comprises 3.9% of the fund, down to  Soundhound  AI, which makes up just 0.2%.
